All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bidder
Represents a bidder for the action.
BidLogEntry
 
Bot
Represents a trading bot that can place bids based on various strategies.
BotState
Represents the state of a trading bot, including its starting resources, current resources, and a history of bids.
BotStateResolver
Provides utility functions to determine the outcome of bot bid competitions.
ConstantStrategy
Implements a strategy that consistently places a bid of a constant size.
FlipStrategy
Implements a strategy that flips a coin (random chance) to decide on placing a bid.
GreedyStrategy
Implements the Greedy Strategy for determining bids.
InverseGreedyStrategy
Implements the Inverse Greedy Strategy for determining bids.
MixedStrategy
Represents a mixed bidding strategy, which utilizes both rolling averages and standard deviation in its decision-making process.
Strategy
Provides an abstract representation of a bidding strategy.
StrategyFactory
Factory class responsible for creating instances of different bidding strategies.
